name: Click Deity
summary: Click Deity is here with some challenges against the gods, and here we have early access to this amazing game. You will have to enchant a lot of mythical heroes here, and it is time to make the right use of the long sword. But after all, we all need to have some better guidance to reach for the best in a game, and you can only have it from a proper beginner guide. So here we are for you to give some beginner guidance as well as some gameplay tips.
